title: Moving charges - force exerted on positive charge

content.question:
A conducting rod oriented vertically moves to the right at a constant speed <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math> through a constant magnetic field <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>B</mi></math> directed into the page, as shown. Which of the following correctly describes the net charge induced on the ends of the rod as it moves through the magnetic field?
Top EndBottom EndAPositiveNegativeBNegativePositiveCZeroNegativeDZeroZero

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
